EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - TCS - The Vodafone Story - 2015.11.24.Email - Follow Up - No Shows
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at Optimization through Automation: The Vodafone Story
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Optimization through Automation: The Vodafone Story
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending Tricentis and TCS’ webinar, Optimization through Automation: The Vodafone Story! In the webinar we shared how Vodafone Australia successfully overcame their testing challenges and optimized their automated testing with stunning results.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <#>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Dominik Weissboeck Managing Director Asia-Pacific Tricentis
N Shriram Title TCS
